website_summaries.verdict: A compact unit that works well for those without much cabinet space.
pros: Sink baffle effectively dampens the sound so it runs quiet
cons: Slow to drain and some packages don't come with an electrical cord

customer_reviews.title: "Sound" Advice (THIS UNIT IS EXTREMELY QUIET)
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting a powerful, but extremely quiet, (for a disposal that is), then, I highly recommend this unit. I had a Badger 5 model that sounded like a saw that they use to slice lumber. Installation was a breeze, (maybe 20 minutes including electrical.) I used the previous "sink collar" so that saved a bit of time. The previous Badger 5, from then same manufacturer, developed cracks early in its life and spewed water all over the place. This 750 model appears to be much better constructed and extremely quiet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Does not sound like a plane taking off, big improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, grinds everything I've thrown down there. The auto reverse is really nice at avoiding clogs. Absolutely worth the extra money over a 1/4th HP or 1/3rd HP model. Don't be an idiot like me though. Remember to punch out the plug for your dishwasher before you install unless you want to do it twice!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S

customer_reviews.title: would not purchase this item again
customer_reviews.text: I replaced this garbage disposal with an older one that had less HP however this new one appears to have less power than my older one.. it constantly smells of mold and my other disposal never did even with regular cleaning..The baffle has already cracked in two different areas which never happened to my other disposal baffle...and we put that through a lot...!! for the price I paid I am very disappointed also makes an odd clicking noise
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few weeks, but so far, it is superior to my old InSinkerator non-Pro model. It is very quiet when running. I have forgotten to turn it off before! It did temorarily stop working once, but I hit the reset button, and it continued working. We did have some electrical work done, so that may have caused the reset to have to be performed. As of now, I'd buy it again...hopefully not before 10-15 years.
customer_reviews.author: H2K

customer_reviews.title: this is the brand you want.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a beast. after going threw 2 other brands (a whirlpool from costco and a waste king) we went back to insinkerator. no problems since and its built WAY better. this thing handles anything i throw at it. will not try any other brands next time. yes they cost more but they work and no headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Mastershake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome garbage disposal. Accidentally had a juice glass drop in and the InSinkErator chopped it up like it was a piece of celery. It was easy to swap out with my prior model. Does a great job. Would highly recommend it even though it Is much pricier than other models. I believe in this case, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: really quiet very good
customer_reviews.text: quiet unit, install went smooth after i read instructions for hanging it back up to the sink ,being a contractor you kind of get ahead of yourself sometimes which i did ,plumbers do it all the time they have little tricks that i forget, since (Insinkerators) last so long i only do mine every 10 years they do make really good disposals and boy this one is really quiet.
customer_reviews.author: reardy

customer_reviews.title: SUPER QUIET!
customer_reviews.text: This disposal is so quiet compared to all of my previous ones that I didn't think it was spinning at first. It almost sounded like it was stalling or something but when I tested it, it swiftly chopped up a large amount of food. I will never go back to the lower end disposals- didn't know what I was missing!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I had a badger 5 before and this is so much quieter! I can barely tell it is running. The noise peaks at 85 dB while chewing ice. Running alone, it is 65 dB. For reference, the faucet running alone is 75 dB. Even my wife agrees that this disposal is an amazing improvement and it is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet unit
customer_reviews.text: This is so quiet that with the water running it is sometimes hard to know it is on. And with a six-year in-home warranty it is well worth the money. We purchased with installation arranged by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Surrogate grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 9 year old InSinkErator with a new InSinkErator PRO750 Pro Series 3/4 HP and was amazed with how quiet it was compared to the old one. Also everytime it's turned on it reverses direction.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: InSinkErator Review
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet in my install - (granite composite sink) - Quick delivery - a little more $$ but worth it in my opinion - PS all disposals SHOULD come WITH the plug/wire nowadays (just charge us for it so its in the box!)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Replacing builders grade with good stuff
customer_reviews.text: What the builder put in 7 years ago was sounding like three knives clashing i could live with, when it started lieaking under the sink i asked my plumber what i should get and he recommended this machine. It is much more quiet and should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: berni

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this disposal. It's very very quiet. I had to look and see it was running when I first turned it on - that's how quiet it is. It's also much larger than our old disposal. Well made and worth the extra expense of getting this higher-end model. Been using it for a several weeks now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rion

customer_reviews.title: Badger 1 to pro750
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a badger 1 that worked for 11 years, it started leaking from the bottom. Install was 1 and a half hours. Not to difficult. This is comparable to insinkerators compact unit. This one costs more due to the warranty which is why i got this one. Noise wise compared to the badger it is fairly quiet. Sink does fill up because of the baffle design. So far i am happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Quitw
customer_reviews.text: Im glad i got the pro version. It's heavy when installing but you won't regret the upgrade once installed.
customer_reviews.author: chad mccartney

customer_reviews.title: Small and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest disposal to install. You have to pay attention if it is on since the sound of running water is louder.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Glassman

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Handles everything I throw into it with aplomb. Quiet, fast, effective, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Computer Geek

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an old Badger type disposal, I wanted something quieter. This did the trick, you can tell the quality is much better.
customer_reviews.author: ascendr

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Quietest disposal I have ever experienced. Was simple to replace existing with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Higgins,Jr

customer_reviews.title: So quiet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were amazed at how compact and quiet this disposal is. Our plumber said these were awesome disposals. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Angie 67

customer_reviews.title: This is the garbage disposal that everyone needs very solidly built and extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the garbage disposal that everyone needs very solidly built and extremely quiet, if you hate those other cheap and loud garbage disposals , you will ❤️ this ☝️ for sure, the higher price is well worth the money 💰, get it you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Easy to install following directions, just be aware it is heavy and awkward but what food disposer wouldn't be? This disposer grinds the waste very fast.
customer_reviews.author: drom

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and great warranty
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet and great warranty. This is the Pro Series which is meant for contractors. What does this mean for you? You get the price of a cheaper model and the warranty of more expensive models...it's a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Bluto

customer_reviews.title: This is a friggin' great garbage disposal
customer_reviews.text: This is a friggin' great garbage disposal. It's whisper quiet and grinds up food like a monster. I'm so glad we didn't cheap out on this during our kitchen remodel. It's worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: KJK SLC

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: My installer (plumber) said InSinkErator is the best brand of disposal, and this is my second one. Works very well, and amazon had the best price for this model. I bought a more souped-up model for another house and also like that one. But I did not need either of the accessories--my old cord and connector were both fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, works perfectly, no problems with slow draining. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, works perfectly, no problems with slow draining. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DB Lever

customer_reviews.title: An excellent machine at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Considering its performance, low price, and outstanding warranty this is a great buy. It is quieter than most machines, just a low hum lets you know it's working. If you are replacing any similar-sized disposal or less, you should find this one an improvement over what you had. The instructions are excellent and easy to follow. Everything you will need is provided except for the plumber's putty and the power cord kit. However, if you are replacing an InSinkErator, you can probably swap over its power cord and use your existing sink mounting so you won't need anything extra. You can view the installation instructions on InSinkErator's website in the Support section if you wish.
customer_reviews.author: Just JimTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality, very quiet in use. Installation was straightforward, but the extra diameter of the body needs to be taken into account when prepping the drain installation.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Leeder

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for less than a week but I like it so far. We had the Badger 5 prior to this and it is much quieter than the previous model. It has been a great change so far.
customer_reviews.author: KristinB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great disposal! Quiet and effective. Very happy with item and seller
customer_reviews.author: PattiL

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage disposer
customer_reviews.text: Great garbage disposer! This unit has handled everything I have thrown at it. This unit is much quieter than the unit it replaced. I should have made this change years ago!
customer_reviews.author: KfillyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a very good quality disposal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on-time. Appears to be a very good quality disposal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Had difficult time to install due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, quiet operation. Love it. Had difficult time to install due to much heavier body than other.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Girl

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.  Quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This disposal replaces one that was 20 years old, and still worked well. However, we put new counter tops and sink in our kitchen and figured we should replace the disposal. Glad we did. Real easy to install. Easy to wire. And talk about quiet. Unless you drop silverware into the disposal you barely know it's running. Much quieter than the concrete mixer we just replaced. Would recommend this to anyone. Hoping it stands the test of time. Very satisfied so far. Recommended by my brother who is a licensed plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: This disposal replaced an InSinkErator 444 that worked, but, needed replacement. Very quiet and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! And quiet!! Never thought one could get so excited about an disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C.

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased with its performance and it installed easily
customer_reviews.text: This disposal was installed following a kitchen remodel. It is VERY quiet! We are pleased with its performance and it installed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Crowshaw

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and works!
customer_reviews.text: If you have garbage and don't want jammed conditions, this is the model for you!
customer_reviews.author: JoeBotts

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Our plumber had no problem installing this unit. It is VERY quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a replacement for my 13 yr old original unit it’s working well so far
customer_reviews.author: geraldina wise

customer_reviews.title: it did a great job but they are more $$$ and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Can barely here this thing running. For the cost too jump to a 3/4 horse is well worth it. My last one was a Kenmore, it did a great job but they are more $$$ and I am pretty sure inSeankErator makes them for Kenmore, it lasted me about 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: onad

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, and has worked well so far, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Martin P. Gelfand

customer_reviews.title: It has plenty of power at 3/4 hp but not as much as the older Pro 77 (11/4 hp) but you get what you pay for and for the price it
customer_reviews.text: While it was much quiter in operation than my old ISE 33 Stainless it was not as quiet as a Kitchen Aid model (also made by ISE ) that I had tried at a home store . It has plenty of power at 3/4 hp but not as much as the older Pro 77 (11/4 hp) but you get what you pay for and for the price it was the best buy . If you are running a commerical kitchen you might opt for the bigger 1 hp models , but for the average user this has all the power you will ever need or use .
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! Easy install and very quiet, no complainants, A++
customer_reviews.author: MCSLISTER

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! This brand was recommended by our plumber
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! This brand was recommended by our plumber, and we've been really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rivendell Folk

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of kitchen machinery
customer_reviews.text: This PRO750 replaced our older builder grade unit which was very noisy and frequently clogged up. Installing it was super quick (item DOES NOT come with plumber putty!) and the improvement is VERY obvious - it runs faster, the water flow is so much better. The unit also comes with a manufacturer 6 year warranty. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: so good. No clogs
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Pro 444 which had a 4 year warranty and lasted a bit longer than that - so okay with replacing. This model is unbelievably quiet compared to the 444! It's so quiet that I'm concerned that it's doing it's job. I've only had it installed for 3 days at this point. So far, so good. No clogs!
customer_reviews.author: petsrule

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: So quiet and so powerful. Very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Weckworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great! Very quiet. You hardly can hear it!
customer_reviews.author: Trip K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how quiet this unit is. I hardly know that it is on and running. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: eagle eye

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD DISPOSER !
customer_reviews.text: This disposer installed very easily... about an hour. It works great... grinds stringy stuff, like banana peels, quickly and is very QUIET. It is not the 'builder grade' disposer... it is as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery as promised (Prime ). Installation relatively easy using suggestion of another review by using a scissors Jack to lift unit into place. Connections from old installation (Kenmore ) aligned perfectly. New unit is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pot Pie

customer_reviews.title: Works great and it is extremely quite
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it is extremely quite. I liked the size, we installed a new sink mounted under counter with a 10" deep sink basin. This InSinkErator fit easily underneath and still gave us room for cleaning supplies kept in the sink cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be great but I have only had it installed for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be great but I have only had it installed for a little over a month. It is quite and powerful but I can't comment on the reliability yet. If a few more months go by and I haven't re-commented you can consider this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M, CA

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh ... you can not even hear this thing run. AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: slightly louder than our current InSinkErator next time I would ...
customer_reviews.text: slightly louder than our current InSinkErator next time I would spend the extra money to go with the top of the line for quite
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Performance!
customer_reviews.text: If half stars were possible, I would have given 4 1/2 for failing to provide a 20 cent wire clamp that caused me to make a special trip to the store. Apart from that, installation was a breeze and it is amazingly quiet compared to the 15 year old 1/2 HP builder-grade Whirlpool that it replaced. The quality shines through and performance has been perfect - we are very happy with this disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Strong. Decent machine for the price. I would recommend over anything you would buy at home depot or lowes
customer_reviews.author: Jason Nadler

customer_reviews.title: grinds well, but the rubber flange (or whatever its ...
customer_reviews.text: grinds well, but the rubber flange (or whatever its called) is too restrictive, so my sink fills up with water while doing the dishes
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Frischhertz

customer_reviews.title: Compact vs. PRO750 -- Not the same product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the PRO750 with 6 yr warranty, but instead received the "Compact" with 4 yr warranty. If I had wanted the Compact, I would have ordered it for about $50 less. This may have been an innocent mistake, but based on the other reviews, I see it's not the first time this has happened. Returned with no issues and bought disposal elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: The pro will not work will on banana peels slow ...
customer_reviews.text: The pro will not work will on banana peels slow at doing that my old Insink Erator did a batter job for half the money save your money !
customer_reviews.author: BLUE FORD

product_meta.title: InSinkErator PRO750 Pro Series 3/4 HP Food Waste Disposal with Evolution Series Technology
product_meta.description:
Perfect for small households or restricted cabinet space. SoundSeal ® technology delivers quiet performance versus a standard disposer. MultiGrind ® technology delivers 2 stages of grind vs. 1 stage in standard disposer. Includes sound-reducing Quiet Collar ® Sink Baffle. Made in USA exclusively for professional plumbing contractors.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
InSinkErator 3/4 Horsepower Dura-Drive Induction Motor Gives you more horsepower than standard disposers.
feature_bullets: This space-saving model is a perfect fit for restricted cabinet space
Sound Seal Makes the Evolution Essential at least 40% quieter than standard disposers
Multi Grind Two grind stages let you quickly grind difficult food waste
Does NOT come with a factory installed power cord; Anti-Microbial Baffle
Includes sound-reducing Quiet Collar Sink Baffle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
